Music

Albums | EPs | Singles | Remixes | Guest Appearances | Mixes | Playlists

ALBUMS
Humanz

Release dates:

Standard / Deluxe: 28th April 2017
Super Deluxe: 3rd November 2017

Formats: Digital / CD / 12″ Vinyl / 12″ Vinyl (Various Colours) / 12″ Vinyl (Picture Disc)

Where to listen: https://gorillaz.lnk.to/humanzSTD

The fifth studio album.

Tracklist:

Intro: I Switched My Robot Off
Ascension [feat. Vince Staples]
Strobelite [feat. Peven Everett]
Saturnz Barz [feat. Popcaan]
Momentz [feat. De La Soul]
Interlude: The Non-conformist Oath
Submission [feat. Danny Brown & Kelela]
Charger [feat. Grace Jones]
Interlude: Elevator Going Up
Andromeda [feat. D.R.A.M.]
Busted and Blue
Interlude: Talk Radio
Carnival [feat. Anthony Hamilton]
Let Me Out [feat. Mavis Staples & Pusha T]
Interlude: Penthouse
Sex Murder Party [feat. Jamie Principle & Zebra Katz]
She’s My Collar [feat. Kali Uchis]
Interlude: The Elephant
Hallelujah Money [feat. Benjamin Clementine]
We Got The Power [feat. Jehnny Beth]*

*Some physical copies refer to this track as “We Got The Power (Version 2:18:482)”.

EPs
A Solar Collaboration [x E.ON]

Release date: March 2018

Formats: 12″ Vinyl (Orange Translucent)

An EP recorded in Kong Solar Studio by various artists during the Humanz Tour. This was a contest prize in the UK, Germany & Hungary; limited to 150 copies.

Tracklist:

Side A –
Lao Ra x Lully x Throwing Shade – Frequency (No Dormir)
RIP Swirl x MazeOne – Meadows
Side B –
Kram Berev x Kapitány Máté x Ress – Szél

Release date: 4th August 2017

Release date: 31st October 2017

Formats: Digital

Where to listen: https://gorillaz.lnk.to/GaragePalace

Andromeda (D.R.A.M. Special)

Release date: 1st December 2017

Formats: Digital

Where to listen: https://gorillaz.lnk.to/dramspecial

The ninth and final single from Humanz (Super Deluxe Edition).

GUEST APPEARANCES
Kali Uchis – Isolation

Release dates:

Standard: 6th April 2018
Blue Transparent Vinyl: 29th June 2018
Red Vinyl: 27th July 2018

Formats: Digital / CD / 12″ Vinyl (Blue Transparent) / 12″ Vinyl (Red)

A track by Kali Uchis that was produced by Gorillaz. The red vinyl was released exclusively in the US at Urban Outfitters; limited to 2500 copies.

Track: 9. (Digital/CD) / B2. (Vinyl) In My Dreams

Release dates: 13th April 2017 – 16th March 2018

Throughout Phase 4, Gorillaz would release a series of playlists on Spotify, reflecting the musical tastes of the band members; they released four simultaneously (one per member) and frequently updated them.
